# Spirit Binding (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[see text]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]], [[6th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text

**Target:** Up to 16 HD worth of spirits, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC)Â­, pg. 123

As *[[Spirit Binding, Lesser (Spell)|lesser spirit binding]]*, except you can attempt to call and trap one or more spirit creatures of the same type whose Hit Dice total no more than 16. If you call multiple spirits, each gets its own saving throw, makes independent attempts to escape, and must be individually persuaded to aid you.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 6, Wizard 6 to Level.
